description: React component for rendering an interactive 3D cube with drag-to-rotate functionality, used in a Tic Tac Toe game. It manages cube rotation, face transformations, and explosion effects based on game state.

methods.name: Cube()
methods.description: Main functional React component that renders the 3D cube scene with interactive and animated features.
